ExperimentTitle:
Experiment No. 20 - Welding on square Butt joint
\To make Square Butt Joint from Stainless Steel Sheet (Flat Position) (SMAW)
Steps:
Step 2

Pick up the wire brush & brush the job edge on the welding table.

Step 3

Grab the steel rule from the tool table & measure the gap between job plates to be 2mm.

Step 4

Go to the powerbox, put the plug in the socket, then the screw & nut. Tighten the screw with a spanner. Repeat the procedure for the other plug. Set the current.

Step 5

Attach a 2.5 mm electrode from the tool table to the welding machine

Step 6

Do the tacking on joint by keeping pitch of 50 mm.

Step 7

Place the chill plates on both sides of the job

Step 8

Complete the welding process in one single pass

Step 9

Grab the chipping hammer from the tool tale & clean the excess points from the joint
